card.name: Jenny, the Suicide Doll
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand.

card.name: School Man
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy 2 of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

card.name: Ottakara Atakara
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

card.name: Rudolf Carnac
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, draw 2 cards.

card.name: Hemoglo, Demonic Doctor
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, your opponent chooses a card from their hand and discards it. ■ When this creature is destroyed during your turn, put it into the battle zone from your graveyard at the End Step

card.name: Super Demon Hand
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures. Then put the same number of cards as that creature's cost from the top of your deck into your graveyard.

card.name: Fork %3D Fock
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If you do, you may return an Abyss from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Jashin, Abyssal Ruler
card.text: ■ At the start of your turn, you may put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may put a creature that costs 3 or less from your graveyard. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more darkness creatures and/or darkness tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Jashin, Abyssal Ruler
card.text: ■ At the start of your turn, you may put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may put a creature that costs 3 or less from your graveyard. ■ If you don't have a total of 4 or more darkness creatures and/or darkness tamaseeds, this tamaseed isn't treated as a creature in the battle zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Belle %3D Gelelle
card.text: ■ Abyss Rush ■ When you put this creature, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

card.name: Knife %3D Alife
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, each of your opponent's creatures gets -2000 power until the End Step ■ Each turn, the first time a creature is destroyed, you may draw a card.

card.name: Hamma %3D Dhamma
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs less than the number of cards in your graveyard and destroy it.

card.name: Abyss Diner
card.text: ■ Each turn, the first time one of your creatures attacks, you may put a creature or tamaseed that costs less than that creature from your graveyard.
